If this very precise and circumstantia] account of letters of Dante, of which no previous writer had made mention, could have been accepted as authentic, as it was by Filelfo's editor, Domenico Moreni‚ and by Pelli, Balbo, and others, it would have made a most interesting and valuable addition to our scanty information on the subject.
